Title: Maddalena
Writer: Carlo Alianello, Pierre Bost, Alessandro De Stefani, Augusto Genina, Giorgio Prosperi, Madeleine Masson de Belavalle (play)
Actors: Märta Torén, Gino Cervi, Charles Vanel, Jacques Sernas
Plot: During the annual Good Friday pageant in a tiny Italian village local priest Don Vincenzo faces a crisis when the girl selected to play the Virgin Mary shows up pregnant.
